data.title: Perfect service, hot food hot, tasty
data.text: Low expectations for a chain restaurant for this business lunch - we received great service from Lindsay. Fast, good, friendly, efficient. Chicken Tequila Fettucine was as desired. Tasty, hot, served promptly with a smile. Could not have been better.

data.title: Are here 2 days in a row
data.text: Good food pizza, pasta, salads and more. In San Marcos for work walked one day and had lunch delivered the next day. Good variety and service

data.title: Great salads, pastas and of course...pizzas!
data.text: Casual restaurant with indoor and patio seating.  Always excellent service.  Large portions....we usually share one of the salads and one of the sandwiches.  Fresh ingredients...great menu choices..not your standard pizza or pasta....but yummy!

data.title: Best service ever
data.text: I've lived in Escondido since 1986 and have never eaten here! But went with a large group today (over 40). We sat on the patio. Jessica and Jack were serving us and maintained a pleasant helpful attitude the entire time. Talk about working under stress! They were so efficient and friendly. Very very impressive. My pizza 🍕was The Works with anchovies. The red pepper flakes were fresh and hot! 🌶 the Happy Hour $3 pale ale was not spectacular but a large size and cold and hit the spot. My husband ordered 2 Happy Hour appetizers (half price).  Meatballs marinara and the salmon crostini (my favorite item btw).  You know how a lot of times 1/2 price means half the size? Not here. He couldn't finish them and brought home some leftovers. There's salads and pastas, lots of reasons to go back and try another menu item. Out of the 40 in our group everyone was pleased with their food. Quite an accomplishment! Don't hesitate to eat here. You won't be disappointed.

data.title: Soft garlic rolls
data.text:
I must say the complimentary garlic rolls are so yummy and filling I almost had no room for their pizza! Hahaha!

The Hawaiian pizza was quite good.  

The spicy pasta with Vietnamese chili was so-so.

Staff were very accommodating.  When the initial order of beer came out unavailable, the staff even came with 2 samples of beer to choose from.

Price point is not on the cheap side.

data.title: I was hoping it would be better
data.text: The restaurant has nice decor and outside seating.  The staff was friendly and attentive.  The selection on the menu was good. But the food was just average.  I had the Korean wings, which were kind of bland. I like my food spicy.  The wings were nice size and the meat was juicy, but the flavor could have been spicier.  I also had the "Best" salad with apples, cheese , candied walnuts, and cranberries.  That is my favorite combination of ingredients in a salad. It was ok, but not great.  I am not sure I would go back unless someone else wanted to go there.  Maybe their pizza is better than what I ordered.

data.title: Incredible
data.text: I visited this place while on a business trip. The staff was friendly and attentive. I had a great salad and the pizza was incredible. Full of flavor. It's a little more expensive than the average pizza place but well worth it. I'll definitely be visiting again the next time I'm here.

data.title: Drive 200 miles for a pizza??
data.text:
For years I have seen a sign next to CAL-395 at Ridgecrest, California; really in the middle of nowhere, that states Nova Pizza just 200 or so miles ahead in San Marcos.  I thought somebody was high on something or had a forgotten sign in the back of a pickup and decided to drop the sign there.
Anyway, I had occasion to be in San Marcos for business and my associate took me to dinner there.
Awesome!  The staff is friendly and efficient; the menu is wonderful,(try the Osso Bucco),and diverse, and the experience is memorable.  Priced moderately, so bring the family!

data.title: If you like garlic...eat here!
data.text: Complimentary Garlic rolls and garlic in most descriptions of food..if you like garlic, come here..I do not, I'm actually  allergic so it was challenging  to find something  mild enough for me to enjoy. I did like the pear, walnut, gorganzola  pizza..still garlicky but I was able to manage. My girls had fetuchinni  alfredo..one with chicken the other with shrimp & they both complained too garlicky. We met friends and it was a great atmosphere  to socialize.

data.title: Always a good meal
data.text:
I love Pizza Nova and all the locations.

When in Solana Beach or driving to downtown San Diego, I stop at Pizza Nova for my usual of Lobster Bisque and a salad called Mary Lou.

data.title: Great Local Place
data.text: We find ourselves eating here quite often. It's a great local place with a great family atmosphere.  Our favorites are BEST SALAD, PEPPERONI WHITE PIZZA , FAMOUS BBQ CHICKEN, THAI CHICKEN LINGUINE and of course the Garlic Balls!

data.title: A happy surprise!
data.text: My husband and I just happened to stop here for a late lunch two weeks ago and ordered from the Happy Hour Menu.  What a deal - and so good!  Tasty pizza with plenty of delicious fresh ingredients on top.  We'll be back!

data.title: OK food, good for families.  Lots of beer choices.
data.text: This is popular with a lot of local families.  Pleasant indoor and outdoor dining.  Kids can play outside and within eyeshot of parents dining outside.  Food to me is nothing special.  Lobster Bisque soup was very good.  Lunch salads huge.  Some may like the pizza but it's nothing like New York Pizza.  For pizza go north a couple of blocks to Flippin Pizza in the Ralph's Center.  They show movies on an outdoor screen here on Friday's during the summer months. Parking is good.  Nice wait staff primarily drawn from CSUSM.

data.title: Garlic Balls
data.text: The garlic balls are amazing specially if you add a little bit of salt.  I usually go for the lunch combo of marguerita pizza and salad.

data.title: Tick, Tock, Tick, Tock
data.text: Been here 3 times.  All 3 times service was extremely slow.  From acknowledgment to attentiveness.  Is it possible I drew the shortest straw thrice?

data.title: Great pizza!
data.text: Great  pizza and salad.  Wood fired with lots  of choices for  toppings.   Thin crust sausage & pepperoni  was outstanding.  My wife' s chicken picatta and  salad was very good.   Good  TV'S if you want to watch a game.  Large outdoor area that is kid friendly.  Great find!

data.title: Great Salads, Great Pizza
data.text: I was pleasantly surprised by how good their salads are. I knew they were top notch when I discovered that their salads have apple sticks on top. If you've never had apple on your salad, you are missing out. Their pizza is fresh, and very flavorful. Definitely a must when you are in the area.

data.title: Had the Best Salid
data.text: Four of us old friends came in for lunch and talk.  Found the restaurant staff friendly, knowledgeable and accommodating.  Suggest salad which was every bit as good as she advised us.  Had the old stand by Royal Hawaiian which was short on cheese, some pizza areas didn't even have any, and stingy with the toppings.  The facilities were clean.

data.title: Urban "grey flannel" Chic Pizza
data.text:
Located just off 78 in a mall, Pizza Nova, is a modern study in shades of black to grey decorations. Staff young and personable to guide you through the menu. Need a jump start? Try their white sangria laced with Cointreau and Amaretto liquors @$10.00.
Extensive menu with plenty of choices from overstuffed meatball sandwich to open oven baked pizza. Pizza crust perfect but the sliced red tomatoes were under ripe pale pink and lacked flavor and necessary color for to make it a winner. Better luck next time?
Creme Brulee full of vanilla bean flavor and "crust" cooked to delicious goodness.
Good for lunch and dinner.

data.title: My Favorite Restaurant in North County
data.text: I enjoy coming to Pizza Nova for lunch. Their service is typically quick and the servers are presentable, professional, and friendly. I almost always the the Spicy Chicken Wrap and although the pasta salad is yummy, I usually end up getting fruit so that I can eat some garlic balls without feeling like a total fatty. I don't really like pizza, but my husband has enjoyed the pizza here quite a few times. I keep coming back again and again, it's basically to the point that I crave this amazing chicken wrap. I definitely recommend this place for lunch or dinner, it's always awesome.
